com.wj.android.messageviewer.message

Class GenericMessagePart

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wj.android.messageviewer.message.GenericMessagePart
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMMSMessagePart
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ImagePart, SMILPart, TextPart, VCardPart

    public abstract class GenericMessagePart
extends java.lang.Object
implements IMMSMessagePart
    Simple implementation of the IMMSMessagePart interface.

    Instances of this class can be added to a MMSMessage.

    Author:
    Werner Jaeger

    • Constructor Detail

      • GenericMessagePart

        protected GenericMessagePart(IMMSMessagePart.ContentType contentType,
                  java.lang.String strContentId,
                  java.lang.String strContentLocation,
                  byte[] abContent,
                  java.lang.String strCharset)
        Creates new GenericMessagePart.
        Parameters:
        contentType - the type of the content (e.g. "text/plain"). Must not be null.
        strContentId - the content identifier. Must not be null.
        strContentLocation - the content location . Must not be null.
        abContent - the content . Must not be null.
        strCharset - the character set of text content. Must not be null.
